Reviews.Title: An outstanding product!
Reviews.Author: Mr B "RAB"
Reviews.Content: If you want to travel light and not compromise image quality this is the camera to own. I was amazed when I tested this camera and its image quality against my Nikon D7000 with a Nikkor 18-200 mm lens. Image for image the NX20 and its 18-55 mm lens produced equal quality images, and for close work the images were actually better. No, it will not do all that my Nikon will do, but if your objective is to capture truly high quality images with a camera that is a fraction of the weight and size of a full body DSLR, then this is the camera for you..

Reviews.Title: Phil
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth A. Schubert
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to have something light weight ,but still take high quality pictures & thats what I got. I am very happy with the NX20. I also purchased an adapter so I can use my nikon lenses on it.

Reviews.Content: I had a Samsung nx1000 but wanted a viewer not just a screen and this had so much moretakes awesome picsits so compact and you loose nothing in that

Reviews.Title: better than any dslr for 90%
Reviews.Author: bloomsday "bloomsday"
Reviews.Content: Shutter lag and auto-focus are negatives for people who do grab shots. Otherwise this camera is better than, say, Leica for me..because I love panoramas and do use 3fps shots to catch changing instants (expressions, quick movements etc).I also use a nx1000, usually with the 30/2 and find it's great for grab shots (assuming truly grab, framing instinctively).Both nx20 and nx1000 deliver VERY high resolution files...perhaps better than my Pentax k20D which is equal to the original Canon 5D despite APS vs full frame.

Reviews.Title: So far so good.
Reviews.Author: Texas Buyer
Reviews.Content: The product appears to be a gray market item. There is no USA warranty card enclosed. I don't think it supports UHS-1 SD card and raw files write time is a little long to my taste on a class 10 SDHC.
